reviews.review: Одна из лучших игр в истории . Невероятно захватывающий сюжет , интереснейший геймплей , прекрасно прописанные сатиричные персонажи и реиграбельность  делают эту игру лучшей игрой от Valve и в своём жанре . Я просто не могу найти минусов , графика достойная 2k19 ( да , есть игры и красивее , но для своего времени она очень не плоха ) ,прекрасный сюжет , персонажи , мир диалоги , геймплей , минусов вообще нет . Просто лучшая игра . 10 из 10

збс игрушка, только пожалуйста не сломайте мозг!)
P.S Ебать легкотня второй раз прошел чисто заспидранил))))
игра продолжение первой части но тут есть полее менее хороший кооператив с другом застряли на 2-м уровне с мостом) плюс минус сложно советую а поскольку сейчас на нее акия так вообще крутяк
Поиграл 5 часов, теперь могу профессионально воровать в домах используя физган, спасибо
很好玩，就是可能会头晕
В эту игру можно играть и одному и вдвоем. Не забываемый сюжет и в кооперативе и в обычном ждет вас - да и за такую прекрасную цену - отличная игра (даже в 2019)

Bad game and it gives me nausea. Not recommended at all even though I am not refunding it because it is critically acclaimed and I want to try it again and again. If you are keen to buy, get it during a sale. It would cost 50 cents which is very cheap. Can it recommend later but at the moment I cannot recommend it.

I loved it! It took me about 8 hours to finish. All the character's were very entertaining and full of personality. I liked the new gameplay elements with the different gels. Some of the parts had me stumped for a little while. Mostly the last hour or two. I thought the final battle and ending were great. The song at the end was pretty good too. I was kind of surprised to hear a new original song because I was kind of expecting a remix of the old one. I hope they make another one!

This game is a grandiose head-scratcher of a physics-puzzle game, and introduces the concept of non-Euclidean tunnels to a point of it being comfortable to the player. This game has a great story mode that if you know all the routes and are experienced enough with the story progression of the first game, you should really have no problem beating the game in one-sitting, within 3-4 hours. Not too short, not too long, and you'll have a fun time trying to fight the dumbest moron who ever lived... and also smashing every monitor. The gameplay really shines in its Co-Op campaign and Test Chamber Builder (otherwise known as "Hammer For Children")
The Co-Op is great for building trust between your friends, or wrecking it entirely; like it should. If you beat the entire Portal 2 Co-Op with someone, no doubt they're someone worth trusting. Eat your heart out, Dr. Phil. Working towards getting every Co-Op achievement is quite fun, especially "Triple Crown", which is just straight up punishment for people who don't solve puzzles fast nor have a plan.
Test Chamber Building allows you to not only have a fully interactive sandbox for experimenting with different ideas than what was covered in the campaign, but an infinite selection of chambers to make or complete. In my case, I've taken it upon myself as a great way to play around with unique ideas to prep for eventual video-game development. That being said, it is still not the best tool you can be using to make Source Maps, but my god is it precise for blueprinting and working out ideas in a 3D space. Taking screenshots of test chambers to be built can help inspire drafting simple environments, even though that's definitely not the intention.
There is some great talent in this game and not worth overlooking. Even though Valve is known for its "influential" first-person shooters, this game still ranks very high among Valve's classics. If you love puzzles, physics, and the 4th dimension, you'll love this game. 10/10
This game raped my brain, I like.
